p: We also designed a new Graphical User Interface (GUI) for experts to use the MLP model in order to predict the content of hypericin in H. perforatum species. Indeed, the prediction of hypericin in H. perforatum under new ecological conditions of the site and the phonological stage is gaining popularity among users.
